levels.description:
ATK <@ba.vup>+{atk:0%}</>, ASPD <@ba.vup>+{attack_speed}</>, prioritizes healing units with <$ba.debuff>negative statuses</>; ammo is consumed if the target has a <$ba.debuff>negative status</>, increasing healing to <@ba.vup>{heal_scale:0%}</> of ATK, and removing <$ba.debuff>negative statuses</> from the target. 
<@ba.rem>Attack has <@ba.vup>{attack@trigger_time}</> ammo. Skill ends when all ammo is used (can manually deactivate skill)</>
